{{also|万乗|万乘}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=万乘}}

===Etymology===
[[萬]] (10,000) + [[乘]] ([[measure word]] for a [[chariot]] pulled by a team of four horses)
: In the [[w:Zhou Dynasty|Zhou Dynasty]], a system was enacted whereby the emperor would be allotted a 1,000 [[w:li (unit)|li]] plot of land, along with a fleet of 10,000 chariots (萬乘). Later on, the term 萬乘 came to refer to the emperor.
